page.title: 01WOOTTON ST.LAWRENCE
page.content: WOOTTON ST.LAWRENCE IS A TYPICAL SMALL VILLAGE UNTOUCHED AS YET BY MODERNISATION.NEW BUILDING PROJECTS HAVE BEEN UNDERTAKEN IN THE VILLAGE BUT HAVE BEEN DISCREET AND HAVE BEEN KEPT TO A MINIMUM.THE AGE OLD INDUSTRY OF FARMING STILL SURVIVES NOW AIDED BY MODERN TECHNOLOGY.THE MAJORITY OF PEOPLE WHO NOW RESIDE IN THE VILLAGE HAVE ONLY LIVED THERE FOR A FEW YEARS, SEEKING OUT THE PEACE THAT THE VILLAGE HAS TO OFFER. IN THE PAST FEW DECADES MANY FAMILIES HAVE HAD TO LEAVE THE VILLAGE SEEKING MORE REMUNERATIVE EMPLOYMENT CLOSER TO TOWN.THE VILLAGE SCHOOL STANDS EMPTY AND HAS DONE FOR SEVERAL YEARS.CHILDREN HAVE QUITE A JOURNEY TO GO TO JUNIOR OR SECONDARY SCHOOL.THERE ARE SOME CLUBS AND LEISURE FACILITIES,A VILLAGE SHOP AND THE PEOPLE ARE VERY FRIENDLY.A CAR IS ESSENTIAL DUE TO POOR PUBLIC TRANSPORT
